title: Meh
review: If you are not Turkish probably you will not like it. It is not a 10 or 1 as everyone has mentioned before. It's just a mediocre movie that has partly beautiful acting, especially the Turkoman girl's performance, mostly militarist propaganda, bad script and bad scenario. Go and watch das boot or paths of glory if you want to watch military movie
